# Admin section admin.lightbox=Lightbox admin.lightbox.description=Configure the image lightbox gallery XWiki.Lightbox.LightboxConfigurationClass_isLightboxEnabled=Enable the lightbox XWiki.Lightbox.LightboxConfigurationClass_isLightboxEnabled.hint=Enable the possibility to open content images in a lightbox.
# Gallery template image.lightbox.autoPlay.title=Slideshow image.lightbox.caption.label=Caption image.lightbox.imageId.title=Image ID image.lightbox.imageId.copy.title=Copy image ID image.lightbox.imageId.copy.copied=Copied to clipboard image.lightbox.imageId.permalink=Permalink image.lightbox.date.label=Date image.lightbox.download.title=Download image.lightbox.escape.title=Escape image.lightbox.fileName.label=File name image.lightbox.fullscreen.title=Fullscreen image.lightbox.gallery.title=Image gallery image.lightbox.nextSlide.title=Next image image.lightbox.prevSlide.title=Previous image image.lightbox.publisher.label=Image publisher image.lightbox.toggler.label=Open the image actions
